pxl.Layout
Call with width and height parameters
or with already existing ImageData as source

props.name: source

params.name: data
params.description: [out] warn: size of an array have to be at least 4

classitems.description: Strict limitation, but that's enough for pixel-art
classitems.name: MAX_CANVAS_SIZE

classitems.description: Maximum layer count per layout
classitems.name: MAX_LAYER_COUNT

classitems.description: View-model event name.
classitems.name: PIXELS_CHANGED_EVENT

classitems.description: Reference onto the currently active view instance.
classitems.name: activeView

classitems.description: Is API supported on current browser. Call one before started.
classitems.name: isSupported

classitems.description: Clamp a destination number to min-max borders.
classitems.name: clamp

classitems.description: Use this method to create canvas elements.
classitems.name: createCanvas

classitems.description: Floating point error for comparison method.
Return string is JSON format.
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description:
Add two Vector2 instances;
or add Vector2 instance and numbers.
classitems.name: add

classitems.description:
Substrust one Vector2 instance from another;
or substrust number from Vector2 instance.
classitems.name: sub

classitems.description:
Multiply two Vector2 instances;
or multiply Vector2 instance by numbers.
classitems.name: mul

classitems.description:
Divide one Vector2 instance by another;
or divide Vector2 instance by numbers.
classitems.name: div

classitems.description:
Copy Vector2 instance;
or set new values for Vector2 instance.
classitems.name: set

classitems.description:
Compare two Vector2 instances
or compare Vector2 instance properties with numbers.
classitems.name: cmp

classitems.description: Make Vector2 instance properties absolute.
classitems.name: abs

classitems.description: Make Vector2 instance properties negative.
classitems.name: neg

classitems.description: Swap properties between Vector2 instances.
classitems.name: swap

classitems.description: Round down Vector2 instance properties.
classitems.name: floor

classitems.description: Round up Vector2 instance properties.
classitems.name: ceil

classitems.description: Round Vector2 instance properties.
classitems.name: round

classitems.description: Check for NaN value inside properties.
classitems.name: hasNaN

classitems.description: Check for Infinity value inside properties.
classitems.name: hasInfinity

classitems.description: Return new Vector2 instance with same properties.
classitems.name: clone

params.name: method
params.description: [out] The method to execute when event is fired.

params.name: method
params.description: [in] Have to be same reference as in subscribe method.

classitems.description: Get the current pool's "occupancy".
classitems.name: size

classitems.description: Pop the last available element (or null if pool is empty).
classitems.name: pop

classitems.description: Get available element by index (or null if index is out of size).
classitems.name: at

classitems.description: Get the last available element (or null if pool is empty).
classitems.name: back

classitems.description: Completely reduce size (memory is still occupied).
classitems.name: reduce

classitems.description: Reduce unused memory.
classitems.name: shrink

classitems.description: Deallocate whole data.
classitems.name: free

classitems.description: Append new Layer instance (if possible).
classitems.name: appendLayer

classitems.description: Delete active layer (if has at least one).
classitems.name: deleteLayer

classitems.description:
Each visible layer "drawn" to main dataLayer layer (Back-to-front);
Notify subscribers.
classitems.name: mergeLayers

classitems.description: Replace old color by new one in an active layer.
classitems.name: colorReplace

classitems.description: Plot pixel or group of pixels onto active layer.
classitems.name: plot

classitems.description: Flood fill on an active layer.
classitems.name: fill

classitems.description: Provide an index from position
classitems.name: indexAt

classitems.description: Provide position according to index
classitems.name: positionFrom

classitems.description: Reset the layer to default.
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: Make sure that layers have equal size
classitems.name: copy
merge

classitems.description:
Flood fill (no recursion, custom stack);
Warn: there are possible freezes on canvas sizes more than 512x512
classitems.name: fill

return.description: warn: direct reference onto data's property buffer

classitems.description: Mix two pixels from dest and src ImageDataArray containers

classitems.description:
Simple factory-like method
Take care about view creating and DOM manipulations
Also put new instance into static "instances" list

classitems.description: List of all existing View instances

classitems.description: Update imageData and draw.
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Update the buffer from layout.

classitems.description: Transform canvas to scale offset.

classitems.description: Restore.

classitems.description: Change current scale rate value.

Take pixel colour from layer (lastSession's member)
Save in history

Bresenham algo: http://members.chello.at/easyfilter/bresenham.js
Put the start and end positions to plot the line;
If there are no parameters,
the start and end would be taken from last updated user position.
